price: Icabakuye amata mu kanwa, bakarumanga bahora basomera, ni ubugarariji bwabo no kudashimira Imana Allah. Burya Twebwe Allah, ntiduhana ngo duhashe kiretse abimonogoje mu bugarariji no mu kwihakana inema zacu.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
